about.me: Team of 3 IT professionals. 15+ years of experience. Beta testing Cardano nodes since first public tests pre-ITN.
about.server: Intel® Xeon® Gold processors, NVMe SSD RAID, redundant 10 Gbit network connection. Our own bare-metal servers, plus cloud hosting: 1 Main stake pool node, 1 Backup stake pool node, 4 Private relays in undisclosed locations in Switzerland and world, 2 Public relays in Germany and Finland
